name: Mary Jane SCHNEIDER, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PUBLIC SCHOOL EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT BOARD, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Schneider v. Commonwealth, Public School Employees' Retirement Board

parties: Mary Jane SCHNEIDER, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PUBLIC SCHOOL EMPLOYEES’ RETIREMENT BOARD, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22nd day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Petition for Leave to Append the Text of the Statute are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
161 A.3d 792
